channel.title: 508 attack sytles! help
channel.description: i am running a 508 server, the base is ninescape source, and i just realized when i am holding any scimitar the attack styles are all messed up, when i am training attack, it gives strength xp, when im training defence, it gives me shared xp, how do i fix this problem, thanks!

item.title: 508 attack sytles! help

item.description:

i am running a 508 server, the base is ninescape source, and i just realized when i am holding any scimitar the attack styles are all messed up, when i am training attack, it gives strength xp, when im training defence, it gives me shared xp, how do i fix this problem, thanks!
